content:
Easy Engine - Common Commands
NGINX info - ee info –nginx
PHP info
- ee info –php
MYSQL info
- ee info –mysql
4. All Info
1. ee info
5. Easy Engine version
1. ee -v
6. Get site info
1. ee site info example.com
7. Update easy engine 1. ee update
8. Install PHP7 stack
1. ee stack install –php7
9. Create site
1. ee site create example.com –wp –php7
10. Switch PHP version 1. ee site update example.com –php7
11. Revert the site from php7 stack 1. ee site update example.com –php7=off
12. Delete a wordpress site
1. ee site delete example.com
Reference: https://easyengine.io/docs/commands/
title: Blog
